items.content_html: Oxichat is a minimalist, real-time chat application designed for simplicity and efficiency. It allows users to engage in conversations instantly across different platforms. Built using React, Rust, WebSocket, and the Tauri framework, Oxichat aims to provide a seamless communication experience while being lightweight and secure.
items.title: mintsuku/oxichat: Oxichat is a minimalist, real-time chat application designed for simplicity and efficiency. It allows users to engage in conversations instantly across different platforms. Built using React, Rust, WebSocket, and the Tauri framework, Oxichat aims to provide a seamless communication experience while being lightweight and secure.
